name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
title: Tartaglia: Hydrospout
inPlayDescription: End Phase: When Tartaglia is on the field and has this card equipped, if the opponent's active character has Riptide attached, deal 1 Piercing DMG to that character.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Tartaglia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Tartaglia, equip this card.After Tartaglia equips this card, immediately use Foul Legacy: Raging Tide once.End Phase: When Tartaglia is on the field and has this card equipped, deal 1 Piercing DMG to the opponent's active character if they have Riptide attached.(You must have Tartaglia in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
